images.copyright: The village of Arrone in Umbria, Italy (© Maurizio Rellini/eStock Photo)
images.title: Step back in time...
images.caption: Arrone in Umbria, Italy
images.desc: Close your eyes and picture a charming medieval Italian village, perched on a hill, church bells marking the hours, a hazy spread of patchwork fields fading into the distance. Well, that's the ancient village of Arrone. (On second thought, we probably didn't need the photo.) Arrone looks over the Valnerina, a valley carved by the River Nera, which twists its way through Italy's scenic Umbria region, known as the Green Heart of Italy.
